Version 2.0.49 - Fix Intermittent Wrong Slide Navigation

Bug Fix

  • Fixed: Sometimes navigation went to wrong slide during rapid clicks
  • OLD iframe was writing suspend_data BEFORE NEW navigation ID was set
  • embed_renderer now sets scorm_current_navigation IMMEDIATELY

Technical Details

  • navId now generated in embed_renderer.php (not player.php)
  • scorm_current_navigation_ set IMMEDIATELY when embed.php loads
  • OLD iframes see new navId instantly, stop intercepting
  • Navigation data version bumped to v5

Root Cause

  • OLD iframe checks isOurNavigationStillActive() before writing
  • But scorm_current_navigation_ was only set by player.php
  • If OLD iframe writes before player.php loads, check passes incorrectly
  • Fix: set scorm_current_navigation_ in embed_renderer.php first

Previous Version

  • v2.0.48: Remove time limit for suspend_data write intercepts
